name: Galleria
description: Galleria is an advanced content gallery component.

value.label: value
value.title: An array of objects to display.

fullscreen.label: fullscreen
fullscreen.title: Whether to display the component on fullscreen.

visible.label: visible
visible.title: Specifies the visibility of the mask on fullscreen mode.

responsive-options.label: responsiveOptions
responsive-options.title: An array of options for responsive design.

show-item-navigators.label: showItemNavigators
show-item-navigators.title: Whether to display navigation buttons in item section.

show-thumbnail-navigators.label: showThumbnailNavigators
show-thumbnail-navigators.title: Whether to display navigation buttons in thumbnail container.

show-item-navigators-on-hover.label: showItemNavigatorsOnHover
show-item-navigators-on-hover.title: Whether to display navigation buttons on item hover.

change-item-on-indicator-hover.label: changeItemOnIndicatorHover
change-item-on-indicator-hover.title: When enabled, item is changed on indicator hover.

circular.label: circular
circular.title: Defines if scrolling would be infinite.

auto-play.label: autoPlay
auto-play.title: Items are displayed with a slideshow in autoPlay mode.

transition-interval.label: transitionInterval
transition-interval.title: Time in milliseconds to scroll items.

thumbnails-position.label: thumbnailsPosition
thumbnails-position.title: Position of thumbnails. Valid values are "bottom", "top", "left" and "right".

vertical-thumbnail-view-port-height.label: verticalThumbnailViewPortHeight
vertical-thumbnail-view-port-height.title: Height of the viewport in vertical thumbnail.

show-indicators-on-item.label: showIndicatorsOnItem
show-indicators-on-item.title: When enabled, indicator container is displayed on item container.

indicators-position.label: indicatorsPosition
indicators-position.title: Position of indicators. Valid values are "bottom", "top", "left" and "right".

base-z-index.label: baseZIndex
base-z-index.title: ase zIndex value to use in layering.

mask-class.label: maskClass
mask-class.title: Style class of the mask on fullscreen mode.

container-style.label: containerStyle
container-style.title: Inline style of the component on fullscreen mode. Otherwise, the 'style' property can be used.

container-class.label: containerClass
container-class.title: Style class of the component on fullscreen mode. Otherwise, the 'class' property can be used.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: header
slots.title: Custom content for the component's header.

slots.name: footer
slots.title: Custom content for the component's footer.

slots.name: previousitemicon
slots.title: Custom navigator previous item icon template.

slots.name: nextitemicon
slots.title: Custom navigator next item icon template.
